description: Sets a resource policy on a domain that specifies permissions to access it. When you call PutDomainPermissionsPolicy, the resource policy on the domain is ignored when evaluting permissions. This ensures that the owner of a domain cannot lock themselves out of the domain, which would prevent them from being able to update the resource policy.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The name of the domain on which to set the resource policy.

parameters.name: policyDocument
parameters.description: A valid displayable JSON Aspen policy string to be set as the access control resource policy on the provided domain.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the resource associated with the resource policy.

nested_items.name: revision
nested_items.description: The current revision of the resource policy.

nested_items.name: document
nested_items.description: The resource policy formatted in JSON.
